QuoteText: Once again i provide a friendly reminder of the op's original "subject matter" and thus the essence of debate in this particular thread . I've even taken a moment to highlight the questions the op wishes to address. If you dont want to address the arguments then that is of course your perogative. ResponseText: I'm not "claiming victory" after going off track to an unrelated topic. What i am addressing is related because I am saying it is irrelevant. How is that not related? In fact, this is another example of you changing the subject matter. To point out that they are irrelevant. I thought that was clear.
